Detailed Description

Singleton class which works with tiles in map.

Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum
Enumerator:
DONT_CLEAR 

Don't repaint tiles in map by DONT_CLEAR tiles in palette.

NO_TILE 

In each layer NO_TILE is value for blank tile.

MAX_WIDTH_PALETTE 

Game palettes must be narrower then this value.

MAX_HEIGHT_PALETTE 

Game palettes must be shorter then this value.
